org.apache.taverna.reference

Interface T2ReferenceGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractT2ReferenceGenerator, SimpleT2ReferenceGenerator, UUIDT2ReferenceGenerator

    public interface T2ReferenceGenerator
    Provides new unique T2Reference instances. Used by and injected into the various service interface implementations when registering new reference sets, error documents and lists.
    Author:
    Tom Oinn
    See Also:
    T2Reference

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getNamespace()
      All T2Reference objects will have this namespace
      T2Reference nextErrorDocumentReference(int depth, ReferenceContext context)
      Create a new and otherwise unused T2Reference to an ErrorDocument.
      T2Reference nextListReference(boolean containsErrors, int listDepth, ReferenceContext context)
      Create a new and otherwise unused T2Reference to an IdentifiedList.
      T2Reference nextReferenceSetReference(ReferenceContext context)
      Create a new and otherwise unused T2Reference to a ReferenceSet.

    • Method Detail

      • getNamespace

        String getNamespace()
        All T2Reference objects will have this namespace
        Returns:
        the namespace as a string

      • nextReferenceSetReference

        T2Reference nextReferenceSetReference(ReferenceContext context)
        Create a new and otherwise unused T2Reference to a ReferenceSet. The namespace of the reference will depend on the current workflow run read from the ReferenceContext.
        Returns:
        new T2Reference for a ReferenceSet, namespace and local parts will be initialized and the reference is ready to use when returned.

      • nextListReference

        T2Reference nextListReference(boolean containsErrors,
                              int listDepth,
                              ReferenceContext context)
        Create a new and otherwise unused T2Reference to an IdentifiedList. The namespace of the reference will depend on the current workflow run read from the ReferenceContext.
        Parameters:
        containsErrors - whether the list this reference is generated for contains t2references with their containsErrors property set to true. Returns true if any reference in the list is or contains an error.
        listDepth - depth of the list to which this identifier will be applied
        Returns:
        a new T2Reference for an IdentifiedList. Namespace, type and local parts will be initialized but depth and error content will still be at their default values of '0' and 'false' respectively, these will need to be re-set before the reference is viable.

      • nextErrorDocumentReference

        T2Reference nextErrorDocumentReference(int depth,
                                       ReferenceContext context)
        Create a new and otherwise unused T2Reference to an ErrorDocument. The namespace of the reference will depend on the current workflow run read from the ReferenceContext.
        Parameters:
        depth - the depth of the error document to which this identifier will refer
        Returns:
        a new T2Reference for an ErrorDocument
